about_section.title: A Whole New World of Learning, Care & Play
about_section.subtitle: About Vriksha Pre-School
about_section.description: At Vriksha Kids Pre-School, we provide a secure, joyful, and stimulating environment where your child can explore, learn, and grow. Our thoughtfully crafted curriculum supports every aspect of a child’s development — emotional, social, cognitive, and physical. With a passionate team of trained educators, we focus on personalized care, ensuring your child’s early learning journey is filled with happiness, discovery, and love.

vision_section.title: our vision
vision_section.subtitle: Building a Brighter Future for Reliable ChildCare
vision_section.text: We are dedicated to helping Child thrive, succeed, and find fulfillment in all aspects of their lives.

curriculum_section.text: At Vriksha Kids Pre-School, our curriculum is carefully designed to support different age groups with age-appropriate activities, guided discovery, and joyful learning.

why_early_education.title: Why Early Childhood Education Matters
why_early_education.description: Research shows that the first five years of a child’s life lay the foundation for future success.  At Vriksha Kids Pre-School, we focus on holistic growth — helping children develop socially, emotionally, physically, and intellectually in a happy and secure environment. Whether it’s through play, stories, or structured lessons, our programs make learning fun and meaningful.

awards_section.title: Our Awards & Recognitions
awards_section.text: At Vriksha Kids Pre-School, our commitment to providing a safe, joyful, and enriching learning environment has been recognized by parents and education communities alike. Every award we receive reflects our dedication to nurturing young minds with love andexcellence.

philosophy_section.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy_section.description: At Vriksha Kids Pre-School, we focus on nurturing each child’s unique potential through structured activities, guided play, and personalized care. Our philosophy is rooted in providing a holistic learning environment that prepares children not just academically, but also socially and emotionally.

cards.title: Tailored Learning for Every Child
cards.description: Our child-centric approach respects individual learning styles and paces.

instructors.title: Meet Our Instructors
instructors.description: Our teachers are not just educators — they are mentors and caregivers who play a key role in shaping your child’s early years. Each member of our team is dedicated to fostering curiosity, kindness, and creativity, ensuring your child feels safe, loved, and inspired to learn.  We believe that a child’s learning journey is only as strong as the people who guide it. That’s why we have a passionate and caring team that nurtures every child’s growth with patience, empathy, and dedication.

programs_details.title: Young Toddlers Program
programs_details.description: Our Young Toddlers Program is designed for children aged 1.5 to 2.5 years. It focuses on nurturing curiosity, developing fine and gross motor skills, and fostering early social interaction. We create a safe and caring environment where toddlers explore through sensory activities and guided play.

programs_details.title: Montessori Program
programs_details.description: Vrishka’s Montessori Program introduces structured, child-centered learning for children aged 2.5 to 3.5 years. Through hands-on activities and practical life exercises, children develop independence, focus, and problem-solving skills in a nurturing environment.

programs_details.title: Preschoolers Program
programs_details.description: Designed for children aged 3.5 to 4.5 years, our Preschoolers Program blends academic readiness with creativity and play. We focus on developing literacy, numeracy, social skills, and emotional intelligence through interactive learning.

programs_details.title: Pre-KG / KG Program
programs_details.description: Our Pre-KG and Kindergarten Program prepares children aged 4.5 to 5 years for formal schooling. The curriculum emphasizes academic readiness, leadership, and collaborative learning while ensuring a joyful learning environment.

programs_details.title: Daycare Services
programs_details.description: Vrishka’s Daycare offers a safe and caring environment for children aged 1.5 to 5.5 years. Our daycare is structured with playtime, learning, rest periods, and nutritious meals to ensure a balanced and enriching experience.

admissions_section.title: Admissions Open for 2025-26!!
admissions_section.subtitle: Start your child's learning journey with Vriksha Kids Pre-School. Our simple admission process ensures that you get the best program for your child.

cards.title: Start Course
cards.description: Choose a suitable program for your child based on their age and developmental stage.

cards.title: Make Decision
cards.description: Our team will assist you with school tours, curriculum details, and answer all your queries.

cards.title: Get Enrolled
cards.description: Complete the admission process and watch your child embark on a joyful learning adventure!

why_vriksha_section: Safety and Hygiene as Top Priority

faq.question: What age groups do you provide childcare for?
faq.answer: We provide programs for children aged 1.5 years to 5.5 years, covering Toddlers, Preschoolers, Pre-KG/KG, and Daycare services.

faq.question: How do I register my child for admission?
faq.answer: You can visit our school directly for a tour or register online through our website. Our admissions team will guide you through the process.

faq.question: How do you handle emergencies or medical situations?
faq.answer: We have a strict safety protocol in place. Our staff is trained in basic first-aid and emergency response. Parents are immediately informed and we have tie-ups with nearby hospitals for urgent care.

faq.question: Are there any special programs or extra-curricular activities?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer music, dance, art & craft, storytelling, puppet shows, and outdoor play as part of our extra-curricular activities to ensure a well-rounded development.
